title: Grandeur Emerald and Diamond Haaram - The 'Lakshmi Kasula Mala' Reimagined
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Hyderabadi Polish; Natural Emeralds (28.84 carats total) of Fine Color and Clarity; Brilliant-Cut Diamonds (20.80 carats total); South Sea Pearls (Moti)
features: This three-layered Haaram showcases exquisite craftsmanship with intricate floral patterns meticulously set with dazzling diamonds. The design is accented with vibrant oval-cut Emeralds, adding a touch of regal elegance. The center pendant is detachable and features a stunning Emerald centerpiece surrounded by delicate diamond filigree and lustrous South Sea Pearls. 'Nakshi' style detailing adds a traditional South Indian touch, while the overall design offers a contemporary aesthetic.
occasions: and grand receptions. Also suitable for formal events where you want to make a statement of timeless beauty and cultural richness.
description: This Emerald and Diamond Haaram is a stunning blend of tradition and modern elegance. The vibrant Emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making it a cherished heirloom. The high-quality diamonds sparkle with unmatched brilliance, showcasing the impeccable craftsmanship of our Hyderabad artisans. The detachable pendant offers versatility, allowing you to wear the Haaram in multiple ways. Invest in a piece of art that reflects your refined taste and appreciation for South Indian heritage.
